original: intros es e H es_sorted. induction es as [|e' es' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (eClient e' =? eClient e) eqn:Heq_client. + destruct (eId e' <? eId e) eqn:Heq_id. * rewrite deduplicate_log'_snoc_split; auto. -- intros e'' Hin Heq. apply H. apply in_cons. auto. apply Heq_client. apply leb_complete. apply Heq_id. * apply IH. + apply IH.
